rooms.description: Vastu compliant entrance with a small foyer area for air and light.
Spacious living room adjoining the courtyard; large windows for natural lighting.
Open dining area with view to central courtyard, following Vastu guidelines for social engagement.
Functional kitchen positioned in the north-east corner to harness positive energy, ensuring ventilation and natural light.
Guest bedroom with attached bathroom in the east, allowing ample morning light as per Vastu.

openings.description: South facing entrance to invite positive energy, balanced with privacy screens.
Access from the courtyard ensuring natural light and ventilation.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom located in the north-west, optimized for relaxation and privacy following Vastu.
Private bathroom adjoining master bedroom with natural ventilation.
Additional bedroom on the east side ensuring balanced energy flow.
Compact bedroom with south facing windows for energy balance.

openings.description: North-facing window providing ample light and fresh air, aligned with Vastu.
East-facing balcony providing access to the central courtyard and enhancing spatial harmony.

rooms.description: Small utility room for maintenance, designed in the north-east to balance energy.
Dedicated storage area following Vastu principles with east-west alignment for smooth flow.

openings.description: South facing ventilation shaft to ensure adequate air circulation in upper floors.

vastu_details.entrance: Main entrance placed on the south side to invite positivity.
vastu_details.layout: Triangular layout with central courtyard, promoting communal harmony and natural ventilation.

room_directions.bedrooms: Varies: Master bedroom in north-west, others distributed east/south for balanced energies.

vastu_details.energy_flow: Openings designed to maximize light and fresh air while maintaining privacy.

remarks: Design incorporates traditional Indian elements, Vastu principles, and modern Bohemian aesthetics.
